website_summaries.verdict: A nonstick option that will not lose its nonstick quality over time but will continue to let you get those perfect muffins out every baking session.
pros: Bends and twists to help you get your muffins out of the pan perfectly
Clean and smooth finish on the interior of the muffin cups
cons: The cooking times with this muffin pan tend to be longer than metal tins of the same size

customer_reviews.title: Easy to clean, but super flimsy!
customer_reviews.text: I was very excited to get this product! I make egg bites in it for breakfast. I washed it thoroughly with soap and water before use. I put my egg mixture in, but the pan was super flimsy so I had to put it on top of a cookie sheet. I baked my egg bites in the pan, and they came out very nice. But, when I eat them they tasted like plastic. Hopefully, over time the muffin pan will eventually not make my food taste plasticky. It was very easy to clean too!
customer_reviews.author: bethlynn

customer_reviews.title: So so
customer_reviews.text: It's easy to use, but you have to put something under it or else whenever you pull it out of the oven it will collapse. Not super easy to keep from sticking, but easy to clean, I would definitely still use cooking oil with this just to make sure it doesn't stick to it.
customer_reviews.author: Em

customer_reviews.title: Handy for baking things that stick to regular muffin tins!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use and clean. Did not get hot to touch. Needed to put on cookie sheet for support, though, in order to not have the flexible pan flex too much and spill contents. Very satisfied, though!
customer_reviews.author: Joanne Young

customer_reviews.title: Not non stick
customer_reviews.text: Definitely weren’t non stick. My cupcakes came apart while trying to take them out. I will stick to using this to freeze things only rather than bake in it.
customer_reviews.author: LW

customer_reviews.title: Product review
customer_reviews.text: This product is very flimsy plus it leaves some type of residue on the food cooked in it.
customer_reviews.author: Tanner Blue

customer_reviews.title: Good enough pan.
customer_reviews.text: I like almost everything about this pan. It's pretty except you have to be extremely careful to keep them level or you'll have a mess. I actually had to use a cookie sheet under it.I expected this, it is silicone so it is soft, which means it isn't stiff like a metal pan. Muffins did stick a little, no room to get around them on the middle ones.
customer_reviews.author: Cyndi Ray

customer_reviews.title: Perfect muffin pan for the Keto lifestyle
customer_reviews.text: The silicone muffin pan works great. Clean up is a breeze and it is great for Keto dieters. It is flexible so you should put a cookie sheet under it when using to keep batter or eggs in the cups. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: D. DolinajTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Must Buy
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellent product for a very low price! I bake quiche muffins each week for quick and easy breakfasts on the go. Our regular muffin pan was difficult to clean. With this pan, baking breakfast muffins is a breeze. The muffins slide right out and washing the pan is so simple Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Dr. Donuts

customer_reviews.title: Works well & easy to clean!
customer_reviews.text: Love how easy it is to remove baked items from this pan. Clean up is also a breeze compared to my old metal muffin pans.
customer_reviews.author: Way2Save

customer_reviews.title: Eva
customer_reviews.text: Thickness flimsy. Difficult to clean and cupcake does not come out in a whole piece but breaks off. Sending back.
customer_reviews.author: EVA

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price
customer_reviews.text: Most affortable silicon pan i have found. Great quality and happy with my buy
customer_reviews.author: Annonimouuu

product_meta.title: Silicone Muffin Pan- Nonstick Cupcake/Muffin/Brownie Reusable Baking Tray- Microwave, Oven, Freezer, Dishwasher Safe Bakeware (12 Cups) by Chef Buddy
product_meta.description: Create cute and delicious muffins, cupcakes, tarts, appetizers, and more with this silicone muffin/cupcake pan from Chef Buddy. Upgrade your bakeware with the convenience of reusable microwave and dishwasher safe silicone for the ultimate in both desserts and tasty treats. This baking pan is useful for all your meals with it's easy to use nonstick material- just bake, pop out, and enjoy! important: avoid buying counterfeit products and transactions with unauthorized sellers. Look for our logo on the packaging for every one of our products. Chef Buddy is committed to providing the consumer with the absolute best price and value on our entire line of products, which we ensure by applying a rigorous quality control process.
feature_bullets: MULTI USE BAKING –Suitable for making a variety of desserts, including: cupcakes, muffins, brownies, gelatins, frozen desserts, candy, chocolate, and much more! Take your breakfast to the next level by adding eggs, bacon and chopped veggies for mouthwatering breakfast quiches. Use the nonstick tray to bake biscuits to accompany your dinner, or prepare perfectly sized spinach puffs, crab cakes and tartlets as appetizers!

EASY TO USE – This baking tray has a smooth nonstick surface that will pop treats out easily without the mess, or can be used with paper liners. Simply place the reusable pan on a baking sheet, add filling into the individual cups, and bake your favorite recipe. This cupcake/muffin tray offers quick food release for easier cleanup, allowing you more time to enjoy your meals! It is not necessary to grease the molds, but a little butter can help the food release easier.

100% FOOD GRADE SILICONE MATERIAL– Incredibly durable, this silicone nonstick muffin pan is microwave, oven, dishwasher and freezer safe- making it must-have bakeware for any kitchen. This material is also more flexible than tin or metal, which allows it to bend for storage and still return to its original shape!

PRODUCT DETAILS- Dimensions: 13” x 10” x 1.5”, useful for up to 12 items. Color: Red. Baking temperature tolerance: -40 to 445oF (0-230oC). Made for safe cooking and durability with FDA approved, BPA free, nontoxic, food-grade silicone. This muffin tray is also stain-resistant and top rack dishwasher safe so cleaning is always quick, simple, and worry-free!

SATISFACTION GUARANTEED- Chef Buddy is committed to providing consumers with the absolute best price and value on our entire line of products. NOTE: This is an exclusive product of Chef Buddy and ONLY Silicone Muffin/Cupcake Pan, 12 Cups by Chef Buddy are GUARANTEED to be genuine
